channel.title: Good News Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: The important news behind the headlines from a Biblical perspective is the vital theme of The Good News radio program.
channel.description: Welcome to the Good News program, presented by the publishers of the Good News magazine. The Good News doesn't try to cover-up today's problems. This is a program that dares to look at today's dilemmas and ask the questions that must be asked. It seeks the answers that must be found--answers that can only be discovered from the pages of your Bible. Please join Gary Petty for a discussion of today's Good News subject.
channel.itunes:summary: The Good News radio program doesn't try to cover-up today's problems. This is a program that dares to look at today's dilemmas and ask the questions that must be asked. It seeks the answers that must be found -- answers that can only be discovered from the pages of your Bible.
channel.copyright: United Church of God, an International Association - publishers of The Good News magazine
channel.itunes:author: Good News Magazine

item.title: Easter: The Untold Story
item.description: How did easter come to be observed? Why is the easter bunny and brightly colored eggs so strongly associated with observance of easter? How do you get three days and three nights counting from Friday afternoon (Good Friday) to Sunday morning when many believe Christ was resurrected? For the surprising answers to these and other important questions listen to this program.
